description: Custom code quality rules for this project

rules.message: Remove console.log statements before shipping to production
rules.description: Console logs should not appear in production code
Large functions are harder to test and maintain

rules.message: High cyclomatic complexity - reduce code branches
rules.description: Complex functions indicate code that needs simplification

rules.message: File size exceeds 500KB - consider splitting into smaller modules
rules.description: Very large files are harder to understand and maintain

rules.message: Function has too many parameters (>5) - consider using object parameter
rules.description: Functions with many parameters are harder to use and test

rules.message: Excessive nesting depth detected - refactor for readability
rules.description: Deeply nested code is harder to follow and understand

rules.message: TODO/FIXME comments should be addressed before committing
rules.description: Use issue trackers for tracking work instead of code comments

rules.message: Consider extracting long hardcoded strings to constants
rules.description: Hardcoded strings should be refactored for maintainability
